Class Deck

java.lang.Object
  Deck
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class represents a full deck of Set cards. It contains various methods for manipulating the cards in the deck.

Author:
Ari
See Also:

public boolean verifySet(Card card1,
                         Card card2,
                         Card card3)
Verifies whether the specified group of cards is a set.

Parameters:
card1 - First card
card2 - Second card
card3 - Third card
Returns:
True if the cards form a set and are on the board, false otherwise.
